description: Immigration data capturing details of arrivals, including flight numbers, visa types, and demographic information. This dataset supports analysis of immigration trends and patterns.

metadata.description: Unique identifier for each immigration record.
CIC ID associated with the immigration record; serves as a reference number.
Year of arrival in the United States; Represents the year in which the immigration event occurred.
Month of arrival in the United States; Indicates the month in which the immigration event took place.
Country of citizenship of the individual entering the U.S.; Represented by a numeric code.
Country of residence of the individual; Represented by a numeric code.
Port of entry into the United States; Represents the code for the location where the individual arrived.
Date of arrival in the United States; Format is a numeric representation of the date.
Mode of transportation used by the individual upon arrival; Indicates how the individual entered the country.
State of residence in the U.S. where the individual is staying; Represents the location of the individual's address.
Date of departure from the United States; Format is YYYYMMDD.
Age of the individual at the time of entry into the United States.
Type of visa under which the individual entered the country; Indicates the category of the visa.
Count of individuals in the record; Represents the number of entries associated with the visa.
Date when the admission file was created; Format is YYYYMMDD.
The location where the visa was issued; Typically represented as a state or country code.
Occupation of the individual; Indicates the job or profession of the immigrant.
Departure status of the individual; Indicates whether the individual has departed or is still present.
Date of departure from the U.S.; Indicates when the individual left the country.
Date of entry into the U.S.; Indicates when the individual arrived in the country.
Indicates whether the individual is a matched flag for immigration records.
Year of birth of the individual; Represents the year when the individual was born.
Date until which the immigration record is valid; Format is MMDDYYYY.
Gender of the individual; Values include 'M' for Male and 'F' for Female.
Insurance number associated with the individual; Used for tracking immigration status.
Airline code representing the carrier used for travel.
Unique admission number assigned to each immigration entry.
Flight number associated with the immigration entry.
Type of visa issued to the individual; Indicates the category of visa under which the individual is allowed entry.
